reviews.text: We enjoyed our stay so much. It was spacious, clean, and smelled amazing. Every little detail thought of. I also LOVED the bathroom and shower. The staff were amazing, endless reservations made for us with great recommendations. We never had to touch our luggage, and a taxi was called for us when we checked out. I've never experienced such a great place. I loved the area and got to get to know it very quickly. I wouldn't change a thing about our stay, it was wonderful.

Loved our short stay at this beautiful hotel. Friendly staff and very comfortable rooms. We were upgraded to a room with a fantastic balcony and welcomed with a bottle of champagne and cupcake. Definitely will stay here again on our next trip to Rome. I also love that the lobby had free umbrellas to rent which was perfect for a rainy afternoon.

Great hotel and kind staff. The location is not central, but it is not bad either. The junior suite was spacious and comfortable, and the option of booking the private spa is encouraging for any couple that would like to book. Overall, it is a 4-star to 5-star hotel.

The best hotel in Rome, Italy.  The hotel  room was perfect, the staff was excellent in everything you needed.  Breakfast was the best.  The decor was amazing and the espresso martini were the best in all of Italy.  The location to all major attractions was excellent.  We walked to the Spanish Steps, Fountain of Trevi, Piazza Navona, Pantheoon, Campo di Fiori, Jewish Ghetto, Colosseum and much more.  You must stay there when in Rome, Italy ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏èüáÆüáπüáÆüáπ

THIEVES!!!!!

Worst hotel I have ever experienced. I‚Äôm disgusted it is classed as five star.

We booked this hotel through Holidaze travel agents and stayed 9th September 2022 with my partner William Thomas.

- Room filthy (hair in shower / sink, towels dirty and we found someone else‚Äôs clothes in our wardrobe!).
- Staff obnoxious.
- Cleaners stole my jewellery and bra!!!!! When I reported this to reception their response was ‚Äòhow much is the jewellery worth?‚Äô. I felt like they were missing the point - theft is theft.

I wish we had a Time Machine as I would never have booked this awful hotel! After enjoying our days out in the beautiful city of Rome, we dreaded coming back to that disgrace of a hotel.
